channel.title: Sony's VR Project Morpheus played by Jimmy Fallon
channel.description:
Jimmy Fallon of the The Tonight Show tries Sony's VR headset, Project Morpheus, for the PS4.
Also a new 3D camera with post-picture selectable focus viewpoints.
[url]https://www.gamespot.com/articles/here-s-jimmy-fallon-trying-ps4-s-project-morpheus-on-the-tonight-show/1100-6420185/[/url]

item.title: Sony's VR Project Morpheus played by Jimmy Fallon
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
Nice demo, but that lytro camera is looking less and less legit every time I see it, you can do the same thing with an app called Google Camera on Android KitKat, including the parallax 3D effect.

Read full topic
item.source: Sony's VR Project Morpheus played by Jimmy Fallon
